name: Longecity Dark Theme
description:
Strain reducing and [maybe?] Power-saving.
Screens: http://imgur.com/a/cYGdC
additional_info:
Unfinished, partially documented, should probably be able to figure out functions although they aren't all organized well, sorry about that. Anyone has my permission to copy and distribute as they want, don't even have to give me credit.

I used two pallets, http://www.color-hex.com/color/121212
and http://www.color-hex.com/color/ffffcc

When finished, according to original plans, there wouldn't have been any white/blue backgrounds, and it would have been fully confined to the two pallets listed above.

Good luck!
